md:
giải nghĩa từ "periods" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Periods (noun) - Giai đoạn, thời kỳ

+ Meaning: A period of time is a length of time that is measured from the beginning of an event or situation to the end of it.

+ Example: The company has gone through several periods of financial crisis.

+ Related words: era, age, stage, phase

+ Synonyms: era, age, stage, phase

* Periods (noun) - Điểm chấm

+ Meaning: A period is a punctuation mark (.) that is used to indicate the end of a sentence.

+ Example: Make sure to put a period at the end of the sentence.

+ Related words: comma, colon, semicolon, dash

+ Synonyms: full stop, point

* Periods (noun) - Kỳ kinh nguyệt

+ Meaning: A period is a natural part of the female reproductive cycle in which the uterus prepares for a potential pregnancy.

+ Example: She got her periods when she was 12 years old.

+ Related words: menstruation, menses, cycle

+ Synonyms: menstruation, menses
